title: PAN Card Verification
shortDescription: Whether you're onboarding new employees, verifying vendors, or streamlining KYC for customers, accurate identity verification is key to building trust and reducing risk. Our PAN Card Verification service enables fast and reliable validation of an individual's Permanent Account Number, helping you ensure regulatory compliance and minimize fraud.
detailedDescription: Our PAN Card Verification service allows you to instantly verify the authenticity of any PAN card. This is essential for employers, financial institutions, and anyone needing to confirm identity for compliance or security.

features.title: Instant Results
features.desc: Verification completed within seconds

features.title: High Accuracy
features.desc: Cross-checked with official PAN database

features.title: Fully Secure
features.desc: Data is encrypted and handled with care

features.title: Trusted by Industry Regulations
features.desc: Built to meet compliance standards for secure identity checks

howItWorks.title: Enter PAN Details
howItWorks.desc: Provide the PAN number or upload a scanned copy of the PAN card.

howItWorks.title: Real-time Validation
howItWorks.desc: Our system verifies the information against the official PAN database.

howItWorks.title: Get Instant Report
howItWorks.desc: Receive a detailed report with the verification status and essential details.
